text:
Payroll Tax (Pandemic) (No. 2) Amendment Order 2020

I make the following order under clause 10B of Part 4A of Schedule 2 to the Payroll Tax Act 2008 .

15 September 2020

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Finance

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Payroll Tax (Pandemic) (No. 2) Amendment Order 2020 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Payroll Tax (Pandemic) Order (No. 2) 2020 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Payroll Tax (Pandemic) Order (No. 2) 2020 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 23 September 2020

This order is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
